TextLibrary.Text: You are one of the ones they called the Soulless... yet different.
You are one of the ones they called the Soulless... yet different.
I was the first. And I am the last.
I was the first. And I am the last.
This place is not for you. Live out your life with those whom you care about. Live it out as one of them.
This place is not for you. Live out your life with those whom you care about. Live it out as one of them.
The spirit gave me a gift. Just as everybody saw his Ghostship when we fought it... now they will see Kirine. Beta Prime is gone.
The spirit gave me a gift. Just as everybody saw his Ghostship when we fought it... now they will see Kirine. Beta Prime is gone.
